results.title: Metformin and the risk of dementia based on an analysis of 396,332 participants
results.text_hl: The @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ cohort had an increased risk of all-cause @DISEASE_Dementia @DISEASE_MESH:D003704 @@@dementia@@@ (HR: 1.66, 95% CI: 1.35-2.04) @DISEASE_Dementia @DISEASE_MESH:D003704 @@@Dementia@@@; @DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D010300 @@@PD@@@; @DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@AD@@@; @<m>DISEASE_Dementia_Vascular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015140 @@@vascular dementia@@@ HR Adjustment for age; sex; Charlson Comorbidity Index   Brakedal et al.

citations.NLM: Ji S, Zhao X, Zhu R, Dong Y, Huang L, Zhang T. Metformin and the risk of dementia based on an analysis of 396,332 participants Ther Adv Chronic Dis. 2022;13():20406223221109454. PMID: 35847477
citations.BibTeX: @article{35847477, title={Metformin and the risk of dementia based on an analysis of 396,332 participants}, author={Ji S and Zhao X and Zhu R and Dong Y and Huang L and Zhang T}, journal={Ther Adv Chronic Dis}, volume={13}, pages={20406223221109454}}

results.title: Collocation of metformin and dipeptidyl peptidase-4 inhibitor is associated with increased risk of diabetes-related vascular dementia: A single hospital study in Northern Taiwan.
results.text_hl: Collocation of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and dipeptidyl peptidase-4 inhibitor is associated with increased risk of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@-related @<m>DISEASE_Dementia_Vascular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015140 @@@vascular dementia@@@: A single hospital study in Northern Taiwan.

citations.NLM: Tzeng IS, Hsieh TH. Collocation of metformin and dipeptidyl peptidase-4 inhibitor is associated with increased risk of diabetes-related vascular dementia: A single hospital study in Northern Taiwan. Expert Opin Investig Drugs. 2023 Feb;32(2):171-176. PMID: 36786091
citations.BibTeX: @article{36786091, title={Collocation of metformin and dipeptidyl peptidase-4 inhibitor is associated with increased risk of diabetes-related vascular dementia: A single hospital study in Northern Taiwan.}, author={Tzeng IS and Hsieh TH}, journal={Expert Opin Investig Drugs}, volume={32}, number={2}, pages={171-176}}

results.title: The Association Between Second-Line Oral Antihyperglycemic Medication on Types of Dementia in Type 2 Diabetes: A Nationwide Real-World Longitudinal Study.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Dual therapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@) + dipeptidyl peptidase-4 inhibitor (DPP-4i), @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ + @CHEMICAL_2_4_thiazolidinedione @CHEMICAL_MESH:C089946 @@@thiazolidinedione@@@ (@CHEMICAL_2_4_thiazolidinedione @CHEMICAL_MESH:C089946 @@@TZD@@@), and @CHEMICAL_Sulfonylurea_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013453 @@@sulfonylurea@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Sulfonylurea_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013453 @@@SU@@@) + @CHEMICAL_Thiazolidinediones @CHEMICAL_MESH:D045162 @@@thiazolidinediones@@@ (@CHEMICAL_2_4_thiazolidinedione @CHEMICAL_MESH:C089946 @@@TZD@@@) were significantly associated with all-cause @DISEASE_Dementia @DISEASE_MESH:D003704 @@@dementia@@@ (HR = 0.904, 0.804, and 0.962, respectively) and @<m>DISEASE_Dementia_Vascular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015140 @@@VaD@@@ (HR = 0.865, 0.725, and 0.911, respectively), compared with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Sulfonylurea_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013453 @@@SU@@@.

citations.NLM: Kim WJ, Noh JH, Han K, Park CY. The Association Between Second-Line Oral Antihyperglycemic Medication on Types of Dementia in Type 2 Diabetes: A Nationwide Real-World Longitudinal Study. J Alzheimers Dis. 2021;81(3):1263-1272. PMID: 33935082
citations.BibTeX: @article{33935082, title={The Association Between Second-Line Oral Antihyperglycemic Medication on Types of Dementia in Type 2 Diabetes: A Nationwide Real-World Longitudinal Study.}, author={Kim WJ and Noh JH and Han K and Park CY}, journal={J Alzheimers Dis}, volume={81}, number={3}, pages={1263-1272}}

results.title: Effects of metformin exposure on neurodegenerative diseases in elderly patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: Moreover, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ exposure increased the risk of @DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@Alzheimer's disease@@@ (HR: 2.13, 95% CI=1.20-3.79) and @<m>DISEASE_Dementia_Vascular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015140 @@@vascular dementia@@@ (HR: 2.30, 95% CI=1.25-4.22).

citations.NLM: Kuan YC, Huang KW, Lin CL, Hu CJ, Kao CH. Effects of metformin exposure on neurodegenerative diseases in elderly patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus. Prog Neuropsychopharmacol Biol Psychiatry. 2017 Oct 3;79(Pt B):77-83. PMID: 28583443
citations.BibTeX: @article{28583443, title={Effects of metformin exposure on neurodegenerative diseases in elderly patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus.}, author={Kuan YC and Huang KW and Lin CL and Hu CJ and Kao CH}, journal={Prog Neuropsychopharmacol Biol Psychiatry}, volume={79}, number={Pt B}, pages={77-83}}
